summary: Private Investigator Brenner is handling a case at the grill-station "Löschenkohl". There he finds - besides some chicken - also other meat...that doesn't belong in a good meal.
cast: Josef Hader|Josef Bierbichler|Birgit Minichmayr|Christoph Luser|Pia Hierzegger|Simon Schwarz|Dorka Gryllus|Stipe Erceg|Ivan Shvedoff|Edita Malovcic|Gerti Drassl|Oliver Stern|Petr Meissel|Kathrin Resetarits|Christian Pogats|Martina Zinner|Ana Stefanovic|Gerhard Liebmann|Michael Pascher|Georg Gogitsch|Hermes|Wolfgang Lampl|Perica Antov|Helmut Vinaccia
title: Der Knochenmann
